label: Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
description: Comprehensive field encompassing intelligent systems, machine learning algorithms, statistical analysis, and data-driven decision making. Includes theoretical foundations, practical applications, and emerging technologies in AI and data analytics.

label: Artificial Intelligence
description: Development of computer systems capable of performing tasks requiring human intelligence: learning, reasoning, problem-solving, perception, and language understanding. Encompasses symbolic AI, statistical learning, and hybrid approaches.

label: Data Science
description: Interdisciplinary field combining statistics, mathematics, programming, and domain expertise to extract insights and knowledge from structured and unstructured data. Involves data collection, cleaning, analysis, visualization, and interpretation.

label: Applied AI Systems
description: Practical implementation of AI technologies in real-world applications and industry solutions. Focus on deploying AI models, integrating with existing systems, and solving specific business or societal problems.

label: Machine Learning
description: Algorithms and statistical models enabling computers to learn from data without explicit programming. Includes supervised, unsupervised, semi-supervised, and reinforcement learning approaches for pattern recognition and prediction.

label: Deep Learning
description: Subset of machine learning using multi-layer artificial neural networks to learn hierarchical representations of data. Excels in computer vision, natural language processing, speech recognition, and complex pattern recognition tasks.

label: Natural Language Processing
description: Computational techniques for analyzing, understanding, and generating human language. Covers text processing, semantic analysis, machine translation, sentiment analysis, question answering, and dialogue systems.
aliases: xu ly ngon ngu tu nhien

label: Computer Vision
description: Technology enabling computers to derive meaningful information from visual inputs (images, videos). Applications include object detection, facial recognition, medical imaging, autonomous vehicles, and augmented reality.

label: Signal Processing
description: Analysis, modification, and synthesis of signals including audio, video, sensor data, and communication signals. Essential for feature extraction, noise reduction, and pattern recognition in various AI applications.

label: Supervised Learning
description: Machine learning approach using labeled training data to learn mapping from inputs to outputs. Used for classification (discrete outputs) and regression (continuous outputs) tasks with known ground truth.

label: Unsupervised Learning
description: Learning patterns and structures from unlabeled data without predefined categories. Discovers hidden patterns through clustering, dimensionality reduction, anomaly detection, and association rule learning.

label: Reinforcement Learning
description: Learning optimal behavior through trial-and-error interactions with an environment. Agent learns by receiving rewards or penalties, used in robotics, game playing, resource management, and autonomous systems.

label: Federated Learning
description: Distributed machine learning approach training models across decentralized devices while keeping data localized. Preserves privacy by avoiding central data collection, crucial for healthcare, finance, and mobile applications.

label: Convolutional Neural Networks
description: Deep learning architecture designed for processing grid-like data (images, videos). Uses convolutional layers to automatically learn spatial hierarchies of features, revolutionizing computer vision tasks.

label: Recurrent Neural Networks
description: Neural networks with loops allowing information persistence, ideal for sequential data. Variants like LSTM and GRU handle long-term dependencies, used in time series, language modeling, and speech recognition.

label: Transformer Models
description: Attention-based architecture revolutionizing NLP and beyond. Self-attention mechanisms process entire sequences in parallel, enabling models like BERT, GPT, and T5 to achieve state-of-the-art performance.

label: Generative Models
description: Models learning to generate new data samples resembling training data. Includes GANs for image synthesis, VAEs for data generation, and diffusion models for high-quality content creation.

label: Information Retrieval
description: Finding relevant information from large collections based on user queries. Encompasses search engines, document ranking, query processing, and relevance feedback using statistical and neural approaches.

label: Text Classification
description: Assigning predefined categories to text documents. Applications include spam detection, sentiment analysis, topic categorization, and intent recognition using traditional ML and deep learning methods.

label: Large Language Models
description: Massive neural networks pre-trained on vast text corpora, capable of understanding and generating human-like text. Foundation for chatbots, translation, summarization, and code generation.
aliases: mo hinh ngon ngu tien huan luyen

label: Machine Translation
description: Automatic translation of text or speech from one language to another. Modern systems use neural machine translation with attention mechanisms for fluent, context-aware translations.

label: Image Processing
description: Techniques for manipulating and analyzing digital images. Includes filtering, enhancement, restoration, compression, and transformation for improved quality or feature extraction.

label: Image Segmentation
description: Partitioning images into meaningful regions or objects. Semantic segmentation classifies pixels, instance segmentation identifies individual objects, crucial for medical imaging and autonomous driving.

label: Object Detection
description: Locating and classifying multiple objects within images or videos. Combines classification and localization using bounding boxes, essential for surveillance, retail, and autonomous systems.

label: Video Analysis
description: Processing and understanding video content including action recognition, tracking, event detection, and temporal modeling. Applications in surveillance, sports analytics, and content moderation.

label: Data Analysis
description: Systematic examination of data to discover patterns, relationships, and insights. Combines statistical methods, visualization, and domain knowledge for exploratory and confirmatory analysis.

label: Data Mining
description: Discovering patterns and knowledge from large datasets using machine learning, statistics, and database systems. Extracts actionable insights for decision-making and prediction.

label: Big Data
description: Handling and analyzing datasets too large or complex for traditional methods. Characterized by volume, velocity, variety, requiring distributed systems and specialized tools.

label: Data Engineering
description: Building infrastructure and architecture for data generation, storage, processing, and consumption. Develops pipelines, ensures data quality, and enables analytics at scale.

label: Distributed Data Processing
description: Processing data across multiple machines in parallel for scalability and performance. Uses frameworks like Hadoop MapReduce and Spark for batch and streaming workloads.
aliases: xu ly du lieu phan tan
xu ly du lieu song song

label: Streaming Data Processing
description: Real-time processing of continuous data streams for immediate insights and actions. Critical for IoT, fraud detection, monitoring, and real-time analytics applications.
aliases: xu ly du lieu thoi gian thuc

label: Data Pipeline
description: Automated workflows moving and transforming data from sources to destinations. Orchestrates ETL/ELT processes ensuring reliable, timely data delivery for analytics and applications.

label: Data Warehouse
description: Centralized repository storing integrated data from multiple sources for analysis and reporting. Optimized for complex queries, historical analysis, and business intelligence.
aliases: co so du lieu phan tich

label: Data Visualization
description: Graphical representation of data and information using visual elements like charts, graphs, and maps. Makes complex data accessible, revealing patterns and supporting decision-making.

label: Recommendation Systems
description: Algorithms predicting user preferences and suggesting relevant items. Uses collaborative filtering, content-based, and hybrid approaches for personalized recommendations in e-commerce, streaming, and social media.

label: Intelligent Information Systems
description: Information systems enhanced with AI capabilities for smarter data processing, decision support, and automation. Integrates machine learning, knowledge representation, and intelligent agents.
aliases: he thong thong tin thong minh

label: AI in Industry
description: Application of artificial intelligence in manufacturing, production, supply chain, and industrial automation. Includes predictive maintenance, quality control, process optimization, and smart manufacturing.
aliases: ai ung dung trong cong nghiep

label: Decision Support Systems
description: Computer-based systems supporting business decision-making through data analysis, modeling, and visualization. Combines data warehousing, analytics, and AI for strategic and operational decisions.
aliases: he thong ho tro quyet dinh
he thong quyet dinh thong minh
he thong quyet dinh kinh doanh

label: Software Engineering
description: Systematic approach to software development, operation, and maintenance. Encompasses requirements analysis, design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance using engineering principles and best practices.

label: Web Development
description: Building and maintaining websites and web applications. Covers frontend (user interface), backend (server logic), databases, and deployment on web servers and cloud platforms.

label: Mobile Development
description: Creating applications for mobile devices (smartphones, tablets). Includes native development for iOS/Android and cross-platform frameworks for building apps that run on multiple platforms.
aliases: phat trien ung dung di dong
lap trinh tren thiet bi di dong

label: Software Architecture
description: High-level structure of software systems defining components, their relationships, and principles guiding design and evolution. Critical for scalability, maintainability, and system quality.

label: Distributed Systems
description: Systems with components located on networked computers communicating and coordinating actions. Addresses challenges of concurrency, fault tolerance, consistency, and scalability across multiple nodes.

label: DevOps and Operations
description: Practices combining software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops) to shorten development lifecycle and deliver high-quality software continuously. Emphasizes automation, monitoring, and collaboration.

label: Frontend Development
description: Building user-facing part of web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and frameworks. Focuses on user experience, responsiveness, accessibility, and performance optimization.

label: Backend Development
description: Building server-side logic, databases, and APIs that power web applications. Handles business logic, data processing, authentication, and integration with external services.

label: Full Stack Development
description: Developing both frontend and backend parts of web applications. Full-stack developers work across entire technology stack from database to user interface.

label: Web Security
description: Protecting web applications from vulnerabilities and attacks. Implements security measures against SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, and other web-specific threats.

label: iOS Development
description: Creating applications for Apple's iOS platform (iPhone, iPad). Uses Swift or Objective-C with Xcode IDE, following Apple's Human Interface Guidelines and App Store requirements.

label: Android Development
description: Building applications for Android platform using Kotlin or Java. Utilizes Android Studio, follows Material Design guidelines, and publishes to Google Play Store.

label: Cross-Platform Mobile Development
description: Building mobile apps that run on multiple platforms (iOS, Android) from single codebase. Uses frameworks like React Native, Flutter, enabling faster development and code reuse.
aliases: phat trien di dong thong nhat

label: Microservices Architecture
description: Architectural style structuring application as collection of loosely coupled, independently deployable services. Each service handles specific business capability, communicating via APIs.

label: Monolithic Architecture
description: Traditional architecture where entire application is built as single unified unit. All components are tightly coupled and deployed together, simpler for small applications but harder to scale.

label: Event-Driven Architecture
description: Architecture pattern where system components communicate through events. Enables loose coupling, scalability, and asynchronous processing, ideal for real-time and reactive systems.
aliases: he thong dua tren su kien

label: Serverless Architecture
description: Cloud computing model where cloud provider manages infrastructure, auto-scaling based on demand. Developers focus on code, paying only for actual execution time (Function-as-a-Service).

label: Distributed Computing
description: Computing paradigm where tasks are divided among multiple computers working together to achieve common goal. Enables processing large datasets and complex computations through parallelization.

label: Cloud Computing
description: On-demand delivery of computing resources (servers, storage, databases, networking, software) over internet with pay-as-you-go pricing. Provides scalability, flexibility, and cost efficiency.

label: Large-Scale Systems
description: Systems designed to handle massive amounts of data, users, or transactions. Requires horizontal scalability, load balancing, caching strategies, and distributed architectures.

label: System Performance Optimization
description: Techniques for improving system speed, efficiency, and resource utilization. Includes profiling, caching, database optimization, algorithm improvement, and infrastructure tuning.

label: DevOps Practices
description: Cultural and technical practices promoting collaboration between development and operations teams. Emphasizes automation, continuous feedback, and iterative improvement for faster, reliable delivery.

label: Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Practices of automatically building, testing code changes (CI) and deploying to production (CD). Enables frequent releases, faster feedback, and reduced integration problems.

label: System Monitoring
description: Observing and tracking system performance, availability, and health. Collects metrics, logs, and traces to detect issues, understand behavior, and ensure reliability.
aliases: giam sat va ghi nhat ky

label: Infrastructure Automation
description: Managing and provisioning infrastructure through code rather than manual processes. Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) enables version control, repeatability, and consistency across environments.

label: Containerization
description: Packaging applications with dependencies into isolated containers for consistent deployment across environments. Containers are lightweight, portable, and enable microservices architecture.

label: Database Systems
description: Organized collections of structured data with software to create, manage, and query data. Essential for storing, retrieving, and manipulating information in applications.
aliases: he thong co so du lieu
he quan tri co so du lieu
he thong quan ly du lieu

label: Relational Databases
description: Databases organizing data in tables with rows and columns, using SQL for queries. Ensure data integrity through ACID properties, support complex joins and transactions.
aliases: co so du lieu quan he
he quan tri co so du lieu quan he
co so du lieu co cau truc

label: NoSQL Databases
description: Non-relational databases designed for specific data models and flexible schemas. Types include document, key-value, wide-column, and graph databases, optimized for scalability and performance.
aliases: co so du lieu phi quan he
co so du lieu tai lieu
co so du lieu phan tan

label: Database Design
description: Process of defining database structure, relationships, and constraints to efficiently store and retrieve data. Involves conceptual, logical, and physical design phases.
aliases: thiet ke co so du lieu
kien truc co so du lieu

label: Software Testing
description: Process of evaluating software to find defects and verify it meets requirements. Includes various testing levels, types, and methodologies to ensure quality and reliability.

label: Automated Testing
description: Using software tools to execute tests automatically, comparing actual and expected results. Enables faster feedback, regression testing, and continuous integration.

label: Security Engineering
description: Designing, implementing, and maintaining secure software systems. Focuses on protecting against threats, vulnerabilities, and ensuring confidentiality, integrity, and availability of systems and data.

label: Secure Coding
description: Writing code that is resistant to security vulnerabilities and attacks. Follows best practices to prevent common vulnerabilities like injection, XSS, and buffer overflows.

label: Digital Transformation
description: Integration of digital technology into all areas of business and organizations, fundamentally changing operations and value delivery. Encompasses cloud adoption, automation, data-driven decision making, and organizational culture change.

label: Smart Applications
description: Intelligent software applications leveraging AI, machine learning, and automation to provide adaptive, personalized, and context-aware experiences. Includes IoT integration, predictive analytics, and intelligent automation.

label: Communication Systems
description: Systems for transmitting information between devices, networks, or locations using various technologies. Includes wireless, optical, and network communication protocols and infrastructure.

label: Optical Communication
description: Communication using light waves for data transmission. Includes fiber optics, free-space optical communication, visible light communication, and optical networking technologies.
aliases: truyen thong anh sang nhin thay

label: Vehicle Communication and Sensing
description: Technologies enabling vehicles to communicate with each other (V2V), infrastructure (V2I), and surrounding environment. Includes sensing, data exchange, and coordination for autonomous and connected vehicles.

label: Hardware Systems
description: Physical computing components and integrated circuits forming the foundation of computers and embedded systems. Includes digital design, FPGA, ASIC, microprocessors, and system-on-chip technologies.

label: FPGA and SoC Design
description: Field-Programmable Gate Arrays and System-on-Chip design for custom hardware solutions. Includes HDL programming, synthesis, verification, and implementation of digital systems on reconfigurable hardware.

label: Integrated Circuit Design
description: Design and development of integrated circuits (ICs) including digital, analog, and mixed-signal chips. Covers VLSI design, chip architecture, verification, and fabrication processes.
aliases: thiet ke vi mach mo rong lon

label: Computer Architecture
description: Design and organization of computer systems including processors, memory hierarchy, I/O systems, and interconnects. Covers instruction set architecture, microarchitecture, and performance optimization.

label: Signal Processing Hardware
description: Specialized hardware for digital signal processing including image processing, video processing, and high-speed data processing. Covers DSP processors, hardware accelerators, and real-time processing systems.
aliases: phan cung xu ly tin hieu

label: Cryptographic Processors
description: Specialized processors for cryptographic operations including encryption, decryption, and post-quantum cryptography. Includes hardware security modules and secure computation architectures.

label: Game Production and Workflow
description: Processes, methodologies, and technologies for game development production pipeline. Covers project management, asset creation, version control, build automation, and quality assurance in game development.

label: Online Game Server Architecture
description: Server-side architecture and infrastructure for online multiplayer games. Includes networking, matchmaking, state synchronization, anti-cheat, and scalable backend systems.

label: Enterprise Systems
description: Large-scale integrated software systems supporting business processes across organizations. Includes ERP, CRM, supply chain management, and business intelligence systems.

label: ERP and CRM Systems
description: Enterprise Resource Planning and Customer Relationship Management systems for managing business operations, resources, and customer interactions across organizations.
aliases: lap ke hoach tai nguyen doanh nghiep
quan ly quan he khach hang

label: Business Intelligence Systems
description: Technologies and practices for collecting, analyzing, and presenting business data to support decision-making. Includes data warehousing, reporting, dashboards, and predictive analytics.
aliases: quyet dinh dua tren du lieu

label: Business Process Optimization
description: Methodologies and technologies for analyzing, improving, and automating business processes. Includes process modeling, simulation, optimization algorithms, and resource management.
aliases: cai tien quy trinh kinh doanh
quan ly quy trinh kinh doanh

label: Agile Software Development
description: Iterative approach to software development emphasizing flexibility, collaboration, and rapid delivery. Includes Scrum, Kanban, XP, and other agile frameworks for project management.
aliases: phuong phap lap trinh cuc han

label: Artificial Immune Systems
description: Computational systems inspired by biological immune systems for pattern recognition, anomaly detection, and optimization. Used in cybersecurity, fault detection, and adaptive systems.
aliases: he thong mien dich nhan tao

label: Wireless Communication Networks
description: Technologies for wireless data transmission including LoRa, LPWAN, WiFi, Bluetooth, and cellular networks. Covers low-power wide-area networks for IoT and long-range communication.
aliases: mang dien rong cong suat thap

label: RF and Microwave Circuit Design
description: Design of radio frequency and microwave circuits for communication systems. Includes high-frequency circuit design, antenna design, and RF system integration.
